events.message: I am filing a claim for the recent car accident I was involved in last week. The collision caused significant damage to the front bumper and left headlight.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the report of the vehicle collision and damages detailed in the initial filing.
An agent has been assigned to your auto accident claim to guide you through the process and answer any questions you may have.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle accident and confirm that the process is underway to assist you promptly.
Please provide photos of the damaged car parts, police report, and repair estimates for further processing of your auto accident claim.
All requested documents including photos, police report, and repair shop estimates have been submitted to support the claim investigation.
The investigation into the vehicle collision claim has begun, including verification of submitted documents and assessment of damages.
The investigation for your car accident claim is now complete, with all damages and liability questions reviewed thoroughly.
A settlement proposal has been prepared based on the investigation findings and estimated repair costs for your vehicle.
We have received your feedback regarding the settlement proposal, and you have expressed satisfaction with the offered terms.
Your auto accident claim has been approved following the acceptance of the settlement terms and verification of all necessary information.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued and should be received by you within the next few business days.
The auto accident claim has now been officially closed after successful payment and resolution of all related matters.
All documentation and details regarding your vehicle collision claim have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
